Proof of Lemma C.1.

For notational simplicity, we omit the dependency on ttitalic_t. Let 𝑷{\bm{P}}bold_italic_P and 𝑷~\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG be the (bounded) linear operators corresponding to the original Markov chain shs_{h}italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and the augmented Markov chain Xh:=(sh,sh+1)X_{h}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=(s_{h},s_{h+1})italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), respectively. Then, it is clear that 𝑷~=⨁s∈𝒮𝑷\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}=\bigoplus_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}{\bm{P}}over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG = ⨁ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_P, where ⨁\bigoplus⨁ denotes the (matrix) direct sum.

We now denote 𝑷∗{\bm{P}}^{*}bold_italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and 𝑷~∗\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}^{*}over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT be their adjoints on L2​(π)L^{2}(\pi)italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_π ) and L2​(π~)L^{2}(\tilde{\pi})italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over~ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG ), respectively, i.e., their time reversals [Lezaud, 1998]. By a well-known property of direct sum [Horn and Johnson, 2012], we have that 𝑷~∗=⨁s∈𝒮𝑷∗\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}^{*}=\bigoplus_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}{\bm{P}}^{*}over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ⨁ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. This can also be seen via explicit computation:

p~∗(y,y′|x,x′):=π~​(y,y′)​p~​(x,x′|y,y′)π~​(x,x′)=π​(y)​p​(y′|y)​p​(x′|x)​𝟙​[y′=x]π​(x)​p~​(x′|x)=π​(y)​p​(x|y)π​(x)⏟=p∗​(y|x)𝟙[y′=x].\tilde{p}^{*}(y,y^{\prime}|x,x^{\prime})\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\frac{\tilde{\pi}(y,y^{\prime})\tilde{p}(x,x^{\prime}|y,y^{\prime})}{\tilde{\pi}(x,x^{\prime})}=\frac{\pi(y)p(y^{\prime}|y)p(x^{\prime}|x)\mathds{1}[y^{\prime}=x]}{\pi(x)\tilde{p}(x^{\prime}|x)}=\underbrace{\frac{\pi(y)p(x|y)}{\pi(x)}}_{=p^{*}(y|x)}\mathds{1}[y^{\prime}=x].over~ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_y , italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_x , italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) : = divide start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG ( italic_y , italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) over~ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG ( italic_x , italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_y , italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG over~ start_ARG italic_π end_ARG ( italic_x , italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG = divide start_ARG italic_π ( italic_y ) italic_p ( italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_y ) italic_p ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_x ) blackboard_1 [ italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_x ] end_ARG start_ARG italic_π ( italic_x ) over~ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_x ) end_ARG = under⏟ start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_π ( italic_y ) italic_p ( italic_x | italic_y ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_π ( italic_x ) end_ARG end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_y | italic_x ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_x ] .

The off-diagonal zero blocks correspond to where 𝟙​[y′=x]=0\mathds{1}[y^{\prime}=x]=0blackboard_1 [ italic_y start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_x ] = 0.

Thus, we have that for every k∈ℕk\in{\mathbb{N}}italic_k ∈ blackboard_N, (𝑷~∗)k​𝑷~k=⨁s∈𝒮(𝑷∗)k​𝑷k(\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}^{*})^{k}\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}^{k}=\bigoplus_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}({\bm{P}}^{*})^{k}{\bm{P}}^{k}( over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = ⨁ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, i.e., the spectrum of (𝑷~∗)k​𝑷~k(\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}^{*})^{k}\widetilde{{\bm{P}}}^{k}( over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is precisely SSitalic_S copies of that of (𝑷∗)k​𝑷k({\bm{P}}^{*})^{k}{\bm{P}}^{k}( bold_italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∗ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. This immediately implies that γps​(𝑷~)=γps​(𝑷)\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}(\widetilde{{\bm{P}}})=\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}({\bm{P}})italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over~ start_ARG bold_italic_P end_ARG ) = italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_P ). ∎

C.2 Proof of Proposition C.2

Recall that

ℒ(k;t):=∑h=1H−1logp^0(k)(st,h+1|st,h)=∑s,s′∈𝒮N^t(s,s′)logp^0(k)(s′|s){\mathcal{L}}(k;t)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\sum_{h=1}^{H-1}\log\widehat{p}_{0}^{(k)}(s_{t,h+1}|s_{t,h})=\sum_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\log\widehat{p}_{0}^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)caligraphic_L ( italic_k ; italic_t ) : = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) roman_log over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) (36)

where

p^0(k)(s′|s):=∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)∑h∈[H−1]𝟙​[st,h=s,st,h+1=s′]∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)∑h∈[H−1]𝟙​[st,h=s].\widehat{p}_{0}^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\frac{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}\sum_{h\in[H-1]}\mathds{1}[s_{t,h}=s,s_{t,h+1}=s^{\prime}]}{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}\sum_{h\in[H-1]}\mathds{1}[s_{t,h}=s]}.over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) : = divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H - 1 ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ∈ [ italic_H - 1 ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_1 [ italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t , italic_h end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_s ] end_ARG . (37)

Then, Algorithm 2 ensures that ttitalic_t is misclassified if and only if

Et≜ℒ​(f^​(t);t)−ℒ​(f​(t);t)>0.E_{t}\triangleq{\mathcal{L}}(\widehat{f}(t);t)-{\mathcal{L}}(f(t);t)>0.italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≜ caligraphic_L ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG ( italic_t ) ; italic_t ) - caligraphic_L ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ; italic_t ) > 0 . (38)

We decompose EtE_{t}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as

Et\displaystyle E_{t}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =∑s,s′∈𝒮N^t​(s,s′)​log⁡p(f^0​(t))​(s′|s)p(f​(t))​(s′|s)⏟≜E1,t\displaystyle=\underbrace{\sum_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\log\frac{p^{(\widehat{f}_{0}(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)}{p^{(f(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)}}_{\triangleq E_{1,t}}= under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≜ italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT
+∑s,s′∈𝒮N^t​(s,s′)​log⁡p^0(f^0​(t))​(s′|s)p(f^0​(t))​(s′|s)⏟≜E2,t+∑s,s′∈𝒮N^t​(s,s′)​log⁡p(f​(t))​(s′|s)p^0(f​(t))​(s′|s)⏟≜E3,t\displaystyle\quad+\underbrace{\sum_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\log\frac{\widehat{p}_{0}^{(\widehat{f}_{0}(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)}{p^{(\widehat{f}_{0}(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)}}_{\triangleq E_{2,t}}+\underbrace{\sum_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\log\frac{p^{(f(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)}{\widehat{p}_{0}^{(f(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)}}_{\triangleq E_{3,t}}+ under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) roman_log divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≜ italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≜ italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

We now upper bound E2,tE_{2,t}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and E3,tE_{3,t}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

To do so, we start with the following concentration for N^t​(s,s′)\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ), which can be derived via Lemma B.4 (similar to Eqn. (27)): for each k∈[K]k\in[K]italic_k ∈ [ italic_K ] and t∈f−1​(k)t\in f^{-1}(k)italic_t ∈ italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k )

ℙ(|N^t(s,s′)−(H−1)π(k)(s)p(k)(s′|s)|≳H​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)γps​log⁡1πmin​δ2)≤δ,{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left|\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-(H-1)\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)\right|\gtrsim\sqrt{\frac{H\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{1}{\pi_{\min}\delta^{2}}}\right)\leq\delta,blackboard_P ( | over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) | ≳ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG ) ≤ italic_δ , (39)

i.e., N^t​(s,s′)≲H​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)+H​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)γps​log⁡T\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\lesssim H\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)+\sqrt{\frac{H\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log T}over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ≲ italic_H italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) + square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log italic_T end_ARG with probability at least 1−1πmin​T21-\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}T^{2}}1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG

We then bound the intermediate estimation error of the transition probabilities:

Lemma C.2.

Let δ∈(0,1)\delta\in(0,1)italic_δ ∈ ( 0 , 1 ), and suppose that H≳1γps​πminH\gtrsim\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\pi_{\min}}italic_H ≳ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG. Then, for each k∈[K]k\in[K]italic_k ∈ [ italic_K ] and s,s′∈𝒮s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S, the following holds with probability at least 1−δ1-\delta1 - italic_δ:

|log⁡p^0(k)​(s′|s)p(k)​(s′|s)|≲1γps​αk​T​H​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)​log⁡αk​Tπmin​δ​log⁡1πmin​δ+ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T.\left|\log\frac{\widehat{p}_{0}^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}\right|\lesssim\sqrt{\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{k}TH\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}\log\frac{\alpha_{k}T}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}}+\frac{\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}.| roman_log divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG | ≲ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T italic_H italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG . (40)

For simplicity, let t∈f−1​(k)t\in f^{-1}(k)italic_t ∈ italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ). By union bound, we have that with probability at least 1−1πmin​T21-\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}T^{2}}1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG,

=∑s,s′∈𝒮(H​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)γps​αk​T​log⁡T)+H​ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T\displaystyle=\sum_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}\left(\sqrt{\frac{H\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{k}T}}\log T\right)+\frac{H\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}= ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG roman_log italic_T ) + divide start_ARG italic_H italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG
+∑s,s′∈𝒮(1αk​T​(log⁡T)3/2γps+H​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)γps​log⁡T​ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T)\displaystyle\quad+\sum_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}\left(\sqrt{\frac{1}{\alpha_{k}T}}\frac{(\log T)^{3/2}}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}+\sqrt{\frac{H\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log T}\frac{\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}\right)+ ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG divide start_ARG ( roman_log italic_T ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log italic_T end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG )
≤S​Hγps​αk​T​log⁡T+H​ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T+S2​(log⁡T)3/2γps​αk​T+S​Hγps​log⁡T​ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T\displaystyle\leq S\sqrt{\frac{H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{k}T}}\log T+\frac{H\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}+\frac{S^{2}(\log T)^{3/2}}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\sqrt{\alpha_{k}T}}+S\sqrt{\frac{H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log T}\frac{\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}≤ italic_S square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG roman_log italic_T + divide start_ARG italic_H italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( roman_log italic_T ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 3 / 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG + italic_S square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log italic_T end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG
≲S​Hγps​αk​T​log⁡T+H​ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T\displaystyle\lesssim S\sqrt{\frac{H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{k}T}}\log T+\frac{H\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}≲ italic_S square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG roman_log italic_T + divide start_ARG italic_H italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG (when H≳S2​log⁡TγpsH\gtrsim\frac{S^{2}\log T}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}italic_H ≳ divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log italic_T end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG)

and the same for E3,tE_{3,t}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT.

Now invoking Theorem 4.1 and the union bound, we have that with probability at least 1−1πmin​T2−1T2​H1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}T^{2}}-\frac{1}{T^{2}H}1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H end_ARG,

E2,t,E3,t≲S​Hγps​αmin​T​log⁡T+H​ηp​ηπαmin​T​T​R​Sγps​H​Δ𝑾2​log⁡(T​H).E_{2,t},E_{3,t}\lesssim S\sqrt{\frac{H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{\min}T}}\log T+\frac{H\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}}{\alpha_{\min}T}\frac{TRS}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}H\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}}\log(TH).italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≲ italic_S square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG roman_log italic_T + divide start_ARG italic_H italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_T italic_R italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_H roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log ( italic_T italic_H ) . (41)

With this, we deduce that t∈ℋt\in{\mathcal{H}}italic_t ∈ caligraphic_H is misclassified only if

H​𝒟π≲−E1,t<E2,t+E3,t≲S​Hγps​αmin​T​log⁡T+ηp​ηπαmin​R​Sγps​Δ𝑾2​log⁡(T​H),H{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}\lesssim-E_{1,t}<E_{2,t}+E_{3,t}\lesssim S\sqrt{\frac{H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{\min}T}}\log T+\frac{\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}}{\alpha_{\min}}\frac{RS}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}}\log(TH),italic_H caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≲ - italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT < italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 , italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≲ italic_S square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG roman_log italic_T + divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_R italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log ( italic_T italic_H ) ,

where the first inequality follows from the definition of ℋ{\mathcal{H}}caligraphic_H. By taking the contrapositive, we can deduce that if both

H​𝒟π≳S​Hγps​αmin​T​log⁡T​ and ​H​𝒟π≳ηp​ηπαmin​R​Sγps​Δ𝑾2​log⁡(T​H)H{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}\gtrsim S\sqrt{\frac{H}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{\min}T}}\log T\text{ and }H{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}\gtrsim\frac{\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}}{\alpha_{\min}}\frac{RS}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}}\log(TH)italic_H caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≳ italic_S square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG end_ARG roman_log italic_T and italic_H caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≳ divide start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG divide start_ARG italic_R italic_S end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log ( italic_T italic_H )

hold, then t∈ℋt\in{\mathcal{H}}italic_t ∈ caligraphic_H must be classified correctly after one-shot likelihood improvement. Combining the other requirement of H≳S2​log⁡TγpsH\gtrsim\frac{S^{2}\log T}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}italic_H ≳ divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_log italic_T end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG and by applying union bound over t∈ℋt\in{\mathcal{H}}italic_t ∈ caligraphic_H, we are done. ∎

C.3 Proof of Lemma C.2

We denote Nt(s):=(H−1)π(f​(t))(s)N_{t}(s)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=(H-1)\pi^{(f(t))}(s)italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) : = ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) and Nt(s,s′):=(H−1)π(f​(t))(s)p(f​(t))(s′|s)N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=(H-1)\pi^{(f(t))}(s)p^{(f(t))}(s^{\prime}|s)italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) : = ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_f ( italic_t ) ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) as the expected number of visitations/transitions under the respective chain’s stationary distribution.

As x1+x≤log⁡(1+x)≤x\frac{x}{1+x}\leq\log(1+x)\leq xdivide start_ARG italic_x end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_x end_ARG ≤ roman_log ( 1 + italic_x ) ≤ italic_x for x>−1x>-1italic_x > - 1, we have that

|log⁡p^0(k)​(s′|s)p(k)​(s′|s)|\displaystyle\left|\log\frac{\widehat{p}_{0}^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}\right|| roman_log divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG |
≤|p^0(k)​(s′|s)p(k)​(s′|s)−1|\displaystyle\leq\left|\frac{\widehat{p}_{0}^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}{p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}-1\right|≤ | divide start_ARG over^ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG - 1 |
=|∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)N^t​(s,s′)∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)N^t​(s)​1p(k)​(s′|s)−1|\displaystyle=\left|\frac{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}\frac{1}{p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}-1\right|= | divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG - 1 |
=|∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)N^t​(s,s′)∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)Nt​(s,s′)​∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)Nt​(s)∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)N^t​(s)⏟≜Ee​s​t​∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)Nt​(s,s′)∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)Nt​(s)​1p(k)​(s′|s)⏟≜Ec​l​u​s​t​e​r−1|.\displaystyle=\left|\underbrace{\frac{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}\frac{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s)}{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}}_{\triangleq E_{est}}\underbrace{\frac{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s)}\frac{1}{p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}}_{\triangleq E_{cluster}}-1\right|.= | under⏟ start_ARG divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ ( over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 | .

Throughout the proof, let ℰ0(k):=f^0−1(k)∖f−1(k){\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)\setminus f^{-1}(k)caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT : = over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) ∖ italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) and 𝒞0(k):=f−1(k)∩f^0−1(k){\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=f^{-1}(k)\cap\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT : = italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) ∩ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ), which satisfies f^0−1​(k)=ℰ0(k)​∪˙​𝒞0(k)\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)={\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}\dot{\cup}{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) = caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over˙ start_ARG ∪ end_ARG caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

We first bound Ee​s​tE_{est}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e italic_s italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT:

|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)N^t​(s,s′)∑t∈f^0−1​(k)Nt​(s,s′)−1|\displaystyle\left|\frac{\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}{\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}-1\right|| divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG
≤|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)(N^t​(s,s′)−Nt​(s,s′))|∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s,s′)\displaystyle\leq\frac{\left|\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\left(\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\right)\right|}{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}≤ divide start_ARG | ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG
≤|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)(N^t​(s,s′)−Nt​(s,s′))|(αk​T−|ℰ0(k)|)​(H−1)​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s)\displaystyle\leq\frac{\left|\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\left(\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\right)\right|}{(\alpha_{k}T-|{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}|)(H-1)\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}≤ divide start_ARG | ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T - | caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | ) ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG (|𝒞0(k)|≥αk​T−|ℰ0(k)||{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}|\geq\alpha_{k}T-|{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}|| caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | ≥ italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T - | caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT |)
≤2​|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)(N^t​(s,s′)−Nt​(s,s′))|αk​T​(H−1)​π(k)​(s)​p(k)​(s′|s).\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left|\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\left(\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\right)\right|}{\alpha_{k}T(H-1)\pi^{(k)}(s)p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}.≤ divide start_ARG 2 | ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T ( italic_H - 1 ) italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG . (|ℰ0(k)|≤e(0)≤αmin​T2≤αk​T2|{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}|\leq e^{(0)}\leq\frac{\alpha_{\min}T}{2}\leq\frac{\alpha_{k}T}{2}| caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | ≤ italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ≤ divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG)

Defining Xt:=N^t(s,s′)−Nt(s,s′)X_{t}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ), note that XtX_{t}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT’s are independent across ttitalic_t and satisfy 𝔼π​[Xt]=0\mathbb{E}_{\pi}[X_{t}]=0blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ] = 0. Let us define an event ℳ:={|Xt|≤M,∀t∈f^0−1(k)}{\mathcal{M}}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\left\{|X_{t}|\leq M,\ \forall t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)\right\}caligraphic_M : = { | italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT | ≤ italic_M , ∀ italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) }, where M>0M>0italic_M > 0 is chosen later. By Hoeffding’s inequality [Hoeffding, 1963] conditioned on ℳ{\mathcal{M}}caligraphic_M, we have that for any z≥0z\geq 0italic_z ≥ 0,

ℙπ(|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)(N^t(s,s′)−Nt(s,s′))|≥z|ℳ)≤exp(−z22​M2​|f^0−1​(k)|).{\mathbb{P}}_{\pi}\left(\left|\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\left(\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\right)\right|\geq z\middle|{\mathcal{M}}\right)\leq\exp\left(-\frac{z^{2}}{2M^{2}|\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)|}\right).blackboard_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( | ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | ≥ italic_z | caligraphic_M ) ≤ roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) | end_ARG ) .

By Lemma B.5 and the fact that |f^0−1​(k)|≤3​αk​T2|\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)|\leq\frac{3\alpha_{k}T}{2}| over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) | ≤ divide start_ARG 3 italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG, we have

ℙ(|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)(N^t(s,s′)−Nt(s,s′))|≥z|ℳ)≤1πminexp(−z26​M2​αk​T).{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left|\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\left(\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\right)\right|\geq z\middle|{\mathcal{M}}\right)\leq\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}}\exp\left(-\frac{z^{2}}{6M^{2}\alpha_{k}T}\right).blackboard_P ( | ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | ≥ italic_z | caligraphic_M ) ≤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG roman_exp ( - divide start_ARG italic_z start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 6 italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG ) .

We choose M≍H​π​(s)​p​(s′|s)γps​log⁡αk​Tπmin​δM\asymp\sqrt{\frac{H\pi(s)p(s^{\prime}|s)}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{\alpha_{k}T}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}}italic_M ≍ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_H italic_π ( italic_s ) italic_p ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG end_ARG. Then, by Eqn. (39), we have that ℙ​(ℳ∁)≤δ2.{\mathbb{P}}({\mathcal{M}}^{\complement})\leq\frac{\delta}{2}.blackboard_P ( caligraphic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∁ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ≤ divide start_ARG italic_δ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG . By reparametrizing z≍M​αk​T​log⁡1πmin​δz\asymp M\sqrt{\alpha_{k}T\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}}italic_z ≍ italic_M square-root start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG end_ARG and union bound, we have that

ℙ​(|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)(N^t​(s,s′)−Nt​(s,s′))|≥αk​T​H​π​(s)​p​(s′|s)γps​log⁡αk​Tπmin​δ​log⁡1πmin​δ)≤δ.\displaystyle{\mathbb{P}}\left(\left|\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\left(\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})-N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})\right)\right|\geq\sqrt{\frac{\alpha_{k}TH\pi(s)p(s^{\prime}|s)}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}}\log\frac{\alpha_{k}T}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}}\right)\leq\delta.blackboard_P ( | ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) | ≥ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T italic_H italic_π ( italic_s ) italic_p ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG end_ARG ) ≤ italic_δ .

Then, combining everything, the following holds with probability at least 1−δ1-\delta1 - italic_δ:

|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)N^t​(s,s′)∑t∈f^0−1​(k)Nt​(s,s′)−1|≲1γps​αk​T​H​π​(s)​p​(s′|s)​log⁡αk​Tπmin​δ​log⁡1πmin​δ.\left|\frac{\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}{\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}-1\right|\lesssim\sqrt{\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{k}TH\pi(s)p(s^{\prime}|s)}\log\frac{\alpha_{k}T}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}}.| divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG - 1 | ≲ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T italic_H italic_π ( italic_s ) italic_p ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG end_ARG . (42)

Under the requirement of H≳1γps​πminH\gtrsim\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\pi_{\min}}italic_H ≳ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG, we similarly have that with probability at least 1−δ1-\delta1 - italic_δ:

|∑t∈f^0−1​(k)N^t​(s)∑t∈f^0−1​(k)Nt​(s)−1|≲1γps​αk​T​H​π​(s)​log⁡αk​Tπmin​δ​log⁡1πmin​δ,\left|\frac{\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}\widehat{N}_{t}(s)}{\sum_{t\in\widehat{f}_{0}^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s)}-1\right|\lesssim\sqrt{\frac{1}{\gamma_{\mathrm{ps}}\alpha_{k}TH\pi(s)}\log\frac{\alpha_{k}T}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}\log\frac{1}{\sqrt{\pi_{\min}}\delta}},| divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over^ start_ARG italic_N end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ over^ start_ARG italic_f end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - 1 | ≲ square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_γ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_ps end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T italic_H italic_π ( italic_s ) end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_δ end_ARG end_ARG , (43)

We now bound Ec​l​u​s​t​e​rE_{cluster}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_l italic_u italic_s italic_t italic_e italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT:

≤∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)+ηp​∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)+∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)\displaystyle\leq\frac{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)+\eta_{p}\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)+\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}≤ divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) + italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG (Assumption 2)
≤∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)+ηp​∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)\displaystyle\leq\frac{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)+\eta_{p}\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}≤ divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) + italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG

We also have that

∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)Nt​(s,s′)∑t∈(f^0)−1​(k)Nt​(s)​1p(k)​(s′|s)\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s,s^{\prime})}{\sum_{t\in(\widehat{f}_{0})^{-1}(k)}N_{t}(s)}\frac{1}{p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)}divide
