≥∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)+ηp−1​∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)+∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)\displaystyle\geq\frac{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)+\eta_{p}^{-1}\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)+\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}≥ divide start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) + italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG (Assumption 2)
=1+(ηp−1−1)​∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)∑t∈𝒞0(k)Nt​(s)+∑t∈ℰ0(k)Nt​(s)>0,\displaystyle=1+\frac{(\eta_{p}^{-1}-1)\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}{\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{C}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)+\sum_{t\in{\mathcal{E}}_{0}^{(k)}}N_{t}(s)}>0,= 1 + divide start_ARG ( italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 ) ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_C start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) + ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t ∈ caligraphic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_N start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG > 0 ,

i.e., we can bound Ec​l​u​s​t​e​rE_{cluster}italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_l italic_u italic_s italic_t italic_e italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT as

|Ec​l​u​s​t​e​r−1|≤2​ηp​ηπ​e(0)αk​T.|E_{cluster}-1|\leq\frac{2\eta_{p}\eta_{\pi}e^{(0)}}{\alpha_{k}T}.| italic_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_c italic_l italic_u italic_s italic_t italic_e italic_r end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - 1 | ≤ divide start_ARG 2 italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 0 ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_α start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_T end_ARG . (44)

Combining everything, we are done. ∎

Appendix D Deferred Proofs from Section 5

D.1 Proof of Proposition 5.1 – Relationship between different gaps

D.1.1 (a) Relationship between 𝒟π{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and Kausik et al. [2023]’s α,Δ\alpha,\Deltaitalic_α , roman_Δ

We first recall the following lemma connecting the KL divergence and the L2L_{2}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT-distance between two probability measures on a finite state space 𝒮{\mathcal{S}}caligraphic_S:

Lemma D.1.

For two probability mass functions p,qp,qitalic_p , italic_q over a finite state space 𝒮{\mathcal{S}}caligraphic_S, we have

log⁡e2qmax∨pmax​L2​(p,q)≤𝖪𝖫⁡(p,q)≤1mins∈𝒮⁡q​(s)​L2​(p,q),\frac{\log\frac{e}{2}}{q_{\max}\vee p_{\max}}L_{2}(p,q)\leq\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}(p,q)\leq\frac{1}{\min_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}q(s)}L_{2}(p,q),divide start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_ARG start_ARG italic_q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∨ italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p , italic_q ) ≤ sansserif_KL ( italic_p , italic_q ) ≤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p , italic_q ) , (45)

where pmax:=maxs∈𝒮p(s)p_{\max}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\max_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}p(s)italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ), qmax:=maxs∈𝒮q(s)q_{\max}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\max_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}q(s)italic_q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_q ( italic_s ), and L2(p,q):=∑s∈𝒮(p(s)−q(s))2L_{2}(p,q)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}(p(s)-q(s))^{2}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p , italic_q ) : = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p ( italic_s ) - italic_q ( italic_s ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Then, note that for each k≠k′k\neq k^{\prime}italic_k ≠ italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT,

𝒟(k,k′)≥π(k)(s(k,k′))𝖪𝖫(p(k)(⋅|s(k,k′)),p(k′)(⋅|s(k,k′)))≥(loge2)α​Δ2pmax,{\mathcal{D}}^{(k,k^{\prime})}\geq\pi^{(k)}(s(k,k^{\prime}))\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s(k,k^{\prime})),p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s(k,k^{\prime}))\right)\geq\left(\log\frac{e}{2}\right)\frac{\alpha\Delta^{2}}{p_{\max}},caligraphic_D start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) sansserif_KL ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ) ≥ ( roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) divide start_ARG italic_α roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ,

where we recall that pmax:=maxk∈[K]maxs,s′∈𝒮p(k)(s′|s)p_{\max}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\max_{k\in[K]}\max_{s,s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}}p^{(k)}(s^{\prime}|s)italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT : = roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k ∈ [ italic_K ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s , italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ). ∎

Remark 6.

Note that the first inequality is tight if such s​(k,k′)s(k,k^{\prime})italic_s ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) is unique because s​(k,k′)s(k,k^{\prime})italic_s ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) is the only state from which kkitalic_k and k′k^{\prime}italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT can be meaningfully distinguished. Also, if there are W​(k,k′)W(k,k^{\prime})italic_W ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) number of such s​(k,k′)s(k,k^{\prime})italic_s ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )’s, then the lower bound can be improved to (log⁡e2)​W​(k,k′)​α​Δ2pmax\left(\log\frac{e}{2}\right)W(k,k^{\prime})\frac{\alpha\Delta^{2}}{p_{\max}}( roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ) italic_W ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) divide start_ARG italic_α roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG.

Proof of Lemma D.1.

The second inequality is due to Csiszar and Talata [2006, Lemma 6.1]. The first inequality is due to a Stackoverflow post and user Ze-Nan Li’s answer, whose proof we reproduce here for completeness.

Let us define η(s):=q​(s)−p​(s)p​(s)\eta(s)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\frac{q(s)-p(s)}{p(s)}italic_η ( italic_s ) : = divide start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG and partition 𝒮{\mathcal{S}}caligraphic_S as follows:

𝒮={s∈𝒮:η​(s)>1}⏟≜𝒮+​∪˙​{s∈𝒮:η​(s)≤1}⏟≜𝒮−.{\mathcal{S}}=\underbrace{\left\{s\in{\mathcal{S}}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}\eta(s)>1\right\}}_{\triangleq{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}\dot{\cup}\underbrace{\left\{s\in{\mathcal{S}}\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}\eta(s)\leq 1\right\}}_{\triangleq{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}.caligraphic_S = under⏟ start_ARG { italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S : italic_η ( italic_s ) > 1 } end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≜ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over˙ start_ARG ∪ end_ARG under⏟ start_ARG { italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S : italic_η ( italic_s ) ≤ 1 } end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≜ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT . (46)

Then it is easy to see that

  1. (i)

    For s∈𝒮+s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, 1+η​(s)≤2η​(s)=eη​(s)​log⁡21+\eta(s)\leq 2^{\eta(s)}=e^{\eta(s)\log 2}1 + italic_η ( italic_s ) ≤ 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η ( italic_s ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η ( italic_s ) roman_log 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, and

  2. (ii)

    For s∈𝒮−s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, 1+η​(s)≤eη​(s)−c​η​(s)21+\eta(s)\leq e^{\eta(s)-c\eta(s)^{2}}1 + italic_η ( italic_s ) ≤ italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_η ( italic_s ) - italic_c italic_η ( italic_s ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where c:=loge2c\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\log\frac{e}{2}italic_c : = roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG.

Then,

𝖪𝖫⁡(p,q)\displaystyle\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}(p,q)sansserif_KL ( italic_p , italic_q ) :=∑s∈𝒮p(s)logp​(s)q​(s)\displaystyle\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}p(s)\log\frac{p(s)}{q(s)}: = ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) roman_log divide start_ARG italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG
=−∑s∈𝒮+p​(s)​log⁡(1+η​(s))−∑s∈𝒮−p​(s)​log⁡(1+η​(s))\displaystyle=-\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}p(s)\log(1+\eta(s))-\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}p(s)\log(1+\eta(s))= - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) roman_log ( 1 + italic_η ( italic_s ) ) - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) roman_log ( 1 + italic_η ( italic_s ) )
≥−log⁡2​∑s∈𝒮+p​(s)​η​(s)−∑s∈𝒮−p​(s)​(η​(s)−c​η​(s)2)\displaystyle\geq-\log 2\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}p(s)\eta(s)-\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}p(s)(\eta(s)-c\eta(s)^{2})≥ - roman_log 2 ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) italic_η ( italic_s ) - ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) ( italic_η ( italic_s ) - italic_c italic_η ( italic_s ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=c​∑s∈𝒮+p​(s)​η​(s)−∑s∈𝒮p​(s)​η​(s)0+c​∑s∈𝒮−p​(s)​η​(s)2\displaystyle=c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}p(s)\eta(s)-\cancelto{0}{\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}p(s)\eta(s)}+c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}p(s)\eta(s)^{2}= italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) italic_η ( italic_s ) - SUPERSCRIPTOP cancel ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) italic_η ( italic_s ) 0 + italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_p ( italic_s ) italic_η ( italic_s ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=c​∑s∈𝒮+(q​(s)−p​(s))+c​∑s∈𝒮−(q​(s)−p​(s))2p​(s)\displaystyle=c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}(q(s)-p(s))+c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}\frac{(q(s)-p(s))^{2}}{p(s)}= italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) ) + italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG ( italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG
≥c​∑s∈𝒮+q​(s)​q​(s)−p​(s)q​(s)+cpmax​∑s∈𝒮−(q​(s)−p​(s))2.\displaystyle\geq c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}q(s)\frac{q(s)-p(s)}{q(s)}+\frac{c}{p_{\max}}\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}(q(s)-p(s))^{2}.≥ italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_q ( italic_s ) divide start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

Now, for s∈𝒮+s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, we have that 0<q​(s)−p​(s)q​(s)≤10<\frac{q(s)-p(s)}{q(s)}\leq 10 < divide start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG ≤ 1, and thus,

𝖪𝖫⁡(p,q)\displaystyle\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}(p,q)sansserif_KL ( italic_p , italic_q ) ≥c​∑s∈𝒮+q​(s)​q​(s)−p​(s)q​(s)+cpmax​∑s∈𝒮−(q​(s)−p​(s))2\displaystyle\geq c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}q(s)\frac{q(s)-p(s)}{q(s)}+\frac{c}{p_{\max}}\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}(q(s)-p(s))^{2}≥ italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_q ( italic_s ) divide start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≥c​∑s∈𝒮+q​(s)​(q​(s)−p​(s)q​(s))2+cpmax​∑s∈𝒮−(q​(s)−p​(s))2\displaystyle\geq c\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}}q(s)\left(\frac{q(s)-p(s)}{q(s)}\right)^{2}+\frac{c}{p_{\max}}\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}}(q(s)-p(s))^{2}≥ italic_c ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_q ( italic_s ) ( divide start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≥cqmax∨pmax​∑s∈𝒮(q​(s)−p​(s))2⏟=L2​(p,q).\displaystyle\geq\frac{c}{q_{\max}\vee p_{\max}}\underbrace{\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}(q(s)-p(s))^{2}}_{=L_{2}(p,q)}.≥ divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_q start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∨ italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG under⏟ start_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_q ( italic_s ) - italic_p ( italic_s ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_p , italic_q ) end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

∎

D.1.2 (b) Relationship between 𝒟π{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and Δ𝐖\Delta_{\mathbf{W}}roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

Here, we provide the full statement of (b) and prove it:

Proposition D.1.

We have

Δ𝑾2≤mink≠k′⁡{2​pmaxlog⁡e2​𝒟π(k,k′)+4​H2​(π(k),π(k′))},\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}\leq\min_{k\neq k^{\prime}}\left\{\frac{2p_{\max}}{\log\frac{e}{2}}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}^{(k,k^{\prime})}+4H^{2}\left(\pi^{(k)},\pi^{(k^{\prime})}\right)\right\},roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k ≠ italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { divide start_ARG 2 italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_ARG caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 4 italic_H start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) } , (47)

where H2​(⋅,⋅)H^{2}(\cdot,\cdot)italic_H start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ , ⋅ ) is the Hellinger distance: H2(p,q):=12(∑s∈𝒮(p​(s)−q​(s))2)12H^{2}(p,q)\mathrel{\mathop{\ordinarycolon}}=\frac{1}{2}\left(\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}(\sqrt{p(s)}-\sqrt{q(s)})^{2}\right)^{\frac{1}{2}}italic_H start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_p , italic_q ) : = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( square-root start_ARG italic_p ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_q ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Furthermore, we also have the following slightly more relaxed bound:

Δ𝑾2≤7​(pmax​𝒟π+(⌈logρ⁡M−1⌉+11−ρ)​12​πmin​𝒟π),\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}\leq 7\left(p_{\max}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}+\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\sqrt{\frac{1}{2\pi_{\min}}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}}\right),roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤ 7 ( italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) , (48)

where ρ\rhoitalic_ρ and MMitalic_M are the contraction constants from the definition of uniformly ergodic Markov chains888Recall that the Markov chain with stationary distribution π\piitalic_π and transition matrix PPitalic_P is uniformly ergodic if there exists ρ∈(0,1)\rho\in(0,1)italic_ρ ∈ ( 0 , 1 ) and M>0M>0italic_M > 0 such that maxs∈𝒮∥PH(s,⋅),π∥1≤MρH\max_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}\left\lVert P^{H}(s,\cdot),\pi\right\rVert_{1}\leq M\rho^{H}roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∥ italic_P start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s , ⋅ ) , italic_π ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≤ italic_M italic_ρ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_H end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT for all H∈ℕH\in{\mathbb{N}}italic_H ∈ blackboard_N..

Proof.

For each s∈𝒮s\in{\mathcal{S}}italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S,

∥π(k)​(s)p(k)(⋅|s)−π(k′)​(s)p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22\displaystyle\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}∥ square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=∥π(k)​(s)(p(k)(⋅|s)−p(k′)(⋅|s))+(π(k)​(s)−π(k′)​(s))p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22\displaystyle=\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right)+\left(\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}\right)p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}= ∥ square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ) + ( square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤2π(k)(s)∥p(k)(⋅|s)−p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22+2(π(k)​(s)−π(k′)​(s))2∥p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22\displaystyle\leq 2\pi^{(k)}(s)\left\lVert p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}+2\left(\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}\right)^{2}\left\lVert p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}≤ 2 italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) ∥ italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 2 ( square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤2π(k)(s)∥p(k)(⋅|s)−p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22+2(π(k)​(s)−π(k′)​(s))2\displaystyle\leq 2\pi^{(k)}(s)\left\lVert p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}+2\left(\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}\right)^{2}≤ 2 italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) ∥ italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 2 ( square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≤2​pmaxlog⁡e2π(k)(s)𝖪𝖫(p(k)(⋅|s),p(k′)(⋅|s))+2(π(k)​(s)−π(k′)​(s))2\displaystyle\leq\frac{2p_{\max}}{\log\frac{e}{2}}\pi^{(k)}(s)\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s),p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right)+2\left(\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}\right)^{2}≤ divide start_ARG 2 italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) sansserif_KL ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ) + 2 ( square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT (Lemma D.1)

We conclude the first part by summing over s∈𝒮s\in{\mathcal{S}}italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S and taking a minimum over k≠k′k\neq k^{\prime}italic_k ≠ italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

For the second part, we start by recalling Le Cam’s inequality [Tsybakov, 2009, Lemma 2.3]:

H2​(π(k),π(k′))≤𝖳𝖵​(π(k),π(k′)).H^{2}\left(\pi^{(k)},\pi^{(k^{\prime})}\right)\leq\mathsf{TV}\left(\pi^{(k)},\pi^{(k^{\prime})}\right).italic_H start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ≤ sansserif_TV ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

We utilize the perturbation bound for Markov chains [Mitrophanov, 2005, Corollary 3.1] to obtain

𝖳𝖵​(π(k),π(k′))\displaystyle\mathsf{TV}\left(\pi^{(k)},\pi^{(k^{\prime})}\right)sansserif_TV ( italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ≤(⌈logρM−1⌉+11−ρ)maxs∈𝒮𝖳𝖵(p(k)(⋅|s),p(k′)(⋅|s))\displaystyle\leq\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\max_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}\mathsf{TV}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s),p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right)≤ ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_TV ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) )
≤(⌈logρ⁡M−1⌉+11−ρ)​12maxs∈𝒮𝖪𝖫(p(k)(⋅|s),p(k′)(⋅|s))\displaystyle\leq\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\sqrt{\frac{1}{2}\max_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s),p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right)}≤ ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_KL ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ) end_ARG (Pinsker’s inequality)
≤(⌈logρ⁡M−1⌉+11−ρ)​12​πmin∑s∈𝒮π(k)(s)𝖪𝖫(p(k)(⋅|s),p(k′)(⋅|s))\displaystyle\leq\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\sqrt{\frac{1}{2\pi_{\min}}\sum_{s\in{\mathcal{S}}}\pi^{(k)}(s)\operatorname{{\mathsf{KL}}}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s),p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right)}≤ ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ∑ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) sansserif_KL ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ) end_ARG
=(⌈logρ⁡M−1⌉+11−ρ)​12​πmin​𝒟π(k,k′).\displaystyle=\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\sqrt{\frac{1}{2\pi_{\min}}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}^{(k,k^{\prime})}}.= ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG .

As 2log⁡e2<7\frac{2}{\log\frac{e}{2}}<7divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG roman_log divide start_ARG italic_e end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_ARG < 7, we finally have that

Δ𝑾2\displaystyle\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≤7​mink≠k′⁡{pmax​𝒟π(k,k′)+(⌈logρ⁡M−1⌉+11−ρ)​12​πmin​𝒟π(k,k′)}\displaystyle\leq 7\min_{k\neq k^{\prime}}\left\{p_{\max}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}^{(k,k^{\prime})}+\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\sqrt{\frac{1}{2\pi_{\min}}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}^{(k,k^{\prime})}}\right\}≤ 7 roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k ≠ italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k , italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG }
=7​(pmax​𝒟π+(⌈logρ⁡M−1⌉+11−ρ)​12​πmin​𝒟π),\displaystyle=7\left(p_{\max}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}+\left(\lceil\log_{\rho}M^{-1}\rceil+\frac{1}{1-\rho}\right)\sqrt{\frac{1}{2\pi_{\min}}{\mathcal{D}}_{\pi}}\right),= 7 ( italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + ( ⌈ roman_log start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_ρ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_M start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ⌉ + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 - italic_ρ end_ARG ) square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_π start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_min end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG caligraphic_D start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) ,

where the last equality follows from the fact that z↦c1​z+c2​zz\mapsto c_{1}z+c_{2}\sqrt{z}italic_z ↦ italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_z + italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT square-root start_ARG italic_z end_ARG is strictly increasing for z>0z>0italic_z > 0 and c1,c2>0c_{1},c_{2}>0italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_c start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT > 0. ∎

D.1.3 (c) Relationship between Δ𝐖\Delta_{\mathbf{W}}roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and Kausik et al. [2023]’s α,Δ\alpha,\Deltaitalic_α , roman_Δ

Similarly, for each s∈𝒮,s\in{\mathcal{S}},italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S ,

∥π(k)​(s)p(k)(⋅|s)−π(k′)​(s)p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22\displaystyle\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}∥ square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=∥π(k)​(s)(p(k)(⋅|s)−p(k′)(⋅|s))+(π(k)​(s)−π(k′)​(s))p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22\displaystyle=\left\lVert\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}\left(p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right)+\left(\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}\right)p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}= ∥ square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ( italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ) + ( square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≥12π(k)(s)∥p(k)(⋅|s)−p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22−(π(k)​(s)−π(k′)​(s))2∥p(k′)(⋅|s)∥22\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\pi^{(k)}(s)\left\lVert p^{(k)}(\cdot|s)-p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}-\left(\sqrt{\pi^{(k)}(s)}-\sqrt{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}\right)^{2}\left\lVert p^{(k^{\prime})}(\cdot|s)\right\rVert_{2}^{2}≥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) ∥ italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) - italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG - square-root start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≥12​α​Δ2−π(k)​(s)​(1−π(k′)​(s)π(k)​(s))2\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\alpha\Delta^{2}-\pi^{(k)}(s)\left(1-\sqrt{\frac{\pi^{(k^{\prime})}(s)}{\pi^{(k)}(s)}}\right)^{2}≥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_α roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) ( 1 - square-root start_ARG divide start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
≥12​α​Δ2−π(k)​(s)​((ηπ−1)2∨(1−1ηπ)2).\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\alpha\Delta^{2}-\pi^{(k)}(s)\left((\sqrt{\eta_{\pi}}-1)^{2}\vee\left(1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{\eta_{\pi}}}\right)^{2}\right).≥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_α roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_k ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) ( ( square-root start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG - 1 ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∨ ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) . (Assumption 2)

Summing over s∈𝒮s\in{\mathcal{S}}italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S and taking the min over k≠k′k\neq k^{\prime}italic_k ≠ italic_k start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, we have:

Δ𝑾2≥12​α​Δ2−((ηπ−1)2∨(1−1ηπ)2).\Delta_{\bm{W}}^{2}\geq\frac{1}{2}\alpha\Delta^{2}-\left((\sqrt{\eta_{\pi}}-1)^{2}\vee\left(1-\frac{1}{\sqrt{\eta_{\pi}}}\right)^{2}\right).roman_Δ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_W end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_α roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( ( square-root start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG - 1 ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∨ ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_η start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_π end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) . (49)

∎

D.2 Proof of Proposition 5.2

We will construct an instance with K=2K=2italic_K = 2. For the state space 𝒮=[S]{\mathcal{S}}=[S]caligraphic_S = [ italic_S ] with S≥2S\geq 2italic_S ≥ 2, assume that S=2​S′S=2S^{\prime}italic_S = 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT for some S′∈ℕS^{\prime}\in{\mathbb{N}}italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ blackboard_N. Let the state space be partitioned as 𝒮=𝒮+​∪˙​𝒮−{\mathcal{S}}={\mathcal{S}}_{+}\dot{\cup}{\mathcal{S}}_{-}caligraphic_S = caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT over˙ start_ARG ∪ end_ARG caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT with 𝒮+=[S′]{\mathcal{S}}_{+}=[S^{\prime}]caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = [ italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] and 𝒮−=[2​S′]∖[S′]{\mathcal{S}}_{-}=[2S^{\prime}]\setminus[S^{\prime}]caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = [ 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] ∖ [ italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ].

The two Markov chains’ transition kernels p(⋅|⋅)p(\cdot|\cdot)italic_p ( ⋅ | ⋅ ) and p′(⋅|⋅)p^{\prime}(\cdot|\cdot)italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | ⋅ ) are defined as

p​(s′|s)={32​S′,s′∈𝒮+,12​S′,s′∈𝒮−,p′​(s′|s)={12​S′,s′∈𝒮+,32​S′,s′∈𝒮−p(s^{\prime}|s)=\begin{cases}\frac{3}{2S^{\prime}},&\quad s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+},\\ \frac{1}{2S^{\prime}},&\quad s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}\end{cases},\quad p^{\prime}(s^{\prime}|s)=\begin{cases}\frac{1}{2S^{\prime}},&\quad s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+},\\ \frac{3}{2S^{\prime}},&\quad s^{\prime}\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}\end{cases}italic_p ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) = { start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW , italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT | italic_s ) = { start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW (50)

Note that pmax≍1Sp_{\max}\asymp\frac{1}{S}italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT roman_max end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ≍ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_S end_ARG. Also, it is easy to check that their stationary distributions π\piitalic_π and π′\pi^{\prime}italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT are given as

π​(s)={34​S′,s∈𝒮+,14​S′,s∈𝒮−,π′​(s)={14​S′,s∈𝒮+,34​S′,s∈𝒮−\pi(s)=\begin{cases}\frac{3}{4S^{\prime}},&\quad s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+},\\ \frac{1}{4S^{\prime}},&\quad s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}\end{cases},\quad\pi^{\prime}(s)=\begin{cases}\frac{1}{4S^{\prime}},&\quad s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+},\\ \frac{3}{4S^{\prime}},&\quad s\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}\end{cases}italic_π ( italic_s ) = { start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW , italic_π start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_s ) = { start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , end_CELL start_CELL italic_s ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_CELL end_ROW (51)

Then, we can set α=14​S′\alpha=\frac{1}{4S^{\prime}}italic_α = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG and Δ2=2S′\Delta^{2}=\frac{2}{S^{\prime}}roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG, i.e., α​Δ2≍1S2\alpha\Delta^{2}\asymp\frac{1}{S^{2}}italic_α roman_Δ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ≍ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG.

On the other hand, we have that

=S′∥3/(4​S′)p(⋅|s+)−1/(4​S′)p′(⋅|s+)∥22+S′∥1/(4​S′)p(⋅|s−)−3/(4​S′)p′(⋅|s−)∥22\displaystyle=S^{\prime}\left\lVert\sqrt{3/(4S^{\prime})}p(\cdot|s_{+})-\sqrt{1/(4S^{\prime})}p^{\prime}(\cdot|s_{+})\right\rVert_{2}^{2}+S^{\prime}\left\lVert\sqrt{1/(4S^{\prime})}p(\cdot|s_{-})-\sqrt{3/(4S^{\prime})}p^{\prime}(\cdot|s_{-})\right\rVert_{2}^{2}= italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ square-root start_ARG 3 / ( 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG italic_p ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - square-root start_ARG 1 / ( 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ∥ square-root start_ARG 1 / ( 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG italic_p ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - square-root start_ARG 3 / ( 4 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( ⋅ | italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ∥ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT (s+∈𝒮+s_{+}\in{\mathcal{S}}_{+}italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT + end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and s−∈𝒮−s_{-}\in{\mathcal{S}}_{-}italic_s start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ∈ caligraphic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT - end_POSTSUBSCRIPT are arbitrarily fixed.)

=S′2​(3​32​S′−12​S′)2+S′2​(3​12​S′−32​S′)2+S′2​(32​S′−3​12​S′)2+S′2​(12​S′−3​32​S′)2\displaystyle=\frac{S^{\prime}}{2}\left(\sqrt{3}\frac{3}{2S^{\prime}}-\frac{1}{2S^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\frac{S^{\prime}}{2}\left(\sqrt{3}\frac{1}{2S^{\prime}}-\frac{3}{2S^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\frac{S^{\prime}}{2}\left(\frac{3}{2S^{\prime}}-\sqrt{3}\frac{1}{2S^{\prime}}\right)^{2}+\frac{S^{\prime}}{2}\left(\frac{1}{2S^{\prime}}-\sqrt{3}\frac{3}{2S^{\prime}}\right)^{2}= divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( square-root start_ARG 3 end_ARG divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( square-root start_ARG 3 end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG - divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG - square-root start_ARG 3 end_ARG divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG - square-root start_ARG 3 end_ARG divide start_ARG 3 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ′ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
